Chapter One

[The three teens]126-the three teens sat on the end of [the rickety wooden dock at [the pond]128-the pond]127-the rickety wooden dock at the pond .

“ Today ’s [my]24-daphne thirteenth birthday , ”[24-daphne] [Daphne Petty]24-daphne told [the boy]129-the boy at [her]24-daphne side , giving [him]129-the boy a coy look and winding a bright red lock of hair around [her]24-daphne finger . “ [You]24-daphne know what that means , right ? ”[24-daphne]

“ That it ’s [Audrey]25-audrey ’s birthday , too ? ”[536-cade] [Cade]536-cade glanced around [Daphne]24-daphne ’s shoulder to smile at [the quieter twin]130-the good twin .

[Audrey]25-audrey gave [him]129-the boy a shy smile , flustered that [he]129-the boy ’d remembered [her]25-audrey . [She]25-audrey sat on the opposite side of [her]25-audrey vivacious , flirty twin , saying nothing . That was usually how it went . [Daphne]24-daphne commanded attention and [Audrey]25-audrey just sort of stood by [her]25-audrey side . Not that [she]25-audrey minded much . [Daphne]24-daphne was also [the bad twin]130-the good twin , and [Audrey]25-audrey liked being [the good twin]130-the good twin . [You]131-you got into trouble a lot less when [you]131-you were [the good twin]130-the good twin , and if there was one thing [Audrey]25-audrey hated , it was being in trouble .

“ [Best friends]1297-my friends , ”[25-audrey] [Audrey]25-audrey said shyly , swinging [her]25-audrey legs .

[Cade]536-cade choked on a laugh . “ [You]536-cade two are too young for [me]536-cade . [I]536-cade ’m fifteen now . [You]536-cade just turned thirteen . ”[536-cade]

“ Well , it ’s [my]25-audrey — ”[25-audrey] [she]25-audrey turned to look at [[her]25-audrey twin]136-her twin “ — [our]1303-our birthday and [you]536-cade need to give [us]1303-our a present . ”[25-audrey]

[Cade]536-cade tugged on the frayed collar of [his]536-cade shirt . It was faded and worn , much like everything [he]536-cade owned . [No one]137-no one talked about it , but [the Archers]138-the archers were [the poorest family on [a rather low - end block of [the neighborhood]140-the neighborhood]139-a rather low - end block of the neighborhood]138-the archers , poorer even than [Audrey]25-audrey and [[Daphne]24-daphne ’s parents , who worked long hours for little pay]141-daphne ’s parents , who worked long hours for little pay . “ [I]24-daphne do n’t have money , [Daphne]24-daphne . [I]24-daphne ca n’t get a job until next year , remember ? ”[24-daphne]

“ It ’s okay , ”[25-audrey] [Audrey]25-audrey said . “ [You]25-audrey can give [us]1304-us something that does n’t cost anything . ”[25-audrey]

“ Like ? ”[24-daphne]

That was not the first time [he]536-cade ’d referred to [them]142-them as [[his]536-cade little sisters]143-my little sisters . “ Maybe just a hug , then ? ”[24-daphne] [Daphne]24-daphne asked sweetly .

“ Of course , ”[536-cade] [Cade]536-cade told [her]25-audrey , leaning in and reaching an arm around [Daphne]24-daphne .

[[Their]145-their friend]146-their friend .

[Cade]536-cade made a noise of surprise and tried to pull away , but [Daphne]24-daphne clung to [him]536-cade like a leech .

“ Daph , stop it , ”[25-audrey] [Audrey]25-audrey hissed . Anger began to bubble inside [her]25-audrey . How dare [Daphne]24-daphne make a scene with [Cade]536-cade . It was bad enough that [she]25-audrey monopolized [him]536-cade constantly . “ Just stop it ! ”[25-audrey]

But [Daphne]24-daphne did n’t stop . [She]24-daphne made a loud mmmmm in the back of [her]24-daphne throat , just to goad [Audrey]25-audrey .

So [Audrey]25-audrey shoved [her]25-audrey twin into [the pond]147-the dock .

[Daphne]24-daphne fell with a splash and a yell , and [Cade]536-cade barely managed to scramble backward onto [the dock]147-the dock . [He]536-cade stared at [Audrey]25-audrey in surprise .

That was okay , because [Audrey]25-audrey was pretty surprised at [her]25-audrey actions , too .

[Dang]28-dang it . There went [her]25-audrey impulsive temper . [Audrey]25-audrey tried to keep it under control , [she]25-audrey really did , but sometimes it got the better of [her]25-audrey .

Like right now .

[Daphne]24-daphne surfaced in [the pond]147-the dock ’s scummy water , screeching as [she]24-daphne flailed . “ [Audrey]25-audrey , [you]25-audrey suck ! ”[24-daphne] [she]24-daphne yelled . “ [Cade]536-cade , help [me]24-daphne out ! ”[24-daphne]

“ That was not cool , [Audrey]25-audrey , ”[536-cade] [Cade]536-cade told [her]24-daphne , leaning over the side of [the dock]147-the dock and extending a hand to [Daphne]24-daphne . When [she]24-daphne continued to flounder in the water , [he]536-cade sighed and looked over at [Audrey]25-audrey , who stood on [the dock]147-the dock , frozen in horror .

[She]24-daphne tried so hard to be [the good twin]130-the good twin , [she]24-daphne really did .

“ Here , hold this , ”[536-cade] [Cade]536-cade told [her]24-daphne , and pulled off [his]536-cade T - shirt . Then [he]536-cade jumped into the water and grabbed [Daphne]24-daphne , who went into [his]536-cade arms , sobbing , and began to pull [her]24-daphne to [the nearby shore]149-the shore .

A moment later , both of [them]150-them were dripping on [the bank of [the shore]149-the shore]149-the shore . [Audrey]25-audrey still stood on [the dock]147-the dock , clutching [Cade]536-cade ’s shirt and mortified by what [she]25-audrey ’d done . [She]25-audrey ’d pushed [her]25-audrey twin in , all because [Daphne’d]29-daphne’d been kissing [the boy Audrey]151-the boy audrey wanted .

But it was n’t just [any boy]151-the boy audrey . It was [Cade]536-cade . [Audrey]25-audrey had adored [him]151-the boy audrey for what seemed like forever , and [Daphne]24-daphne only wanted [him]151-the boy audrey because [Audrey]25-audrey did . That was how it always went .

“ [You]151-the boy audrey came for [me]24-daphne , ”[24-daphne] [Daphne]24-daphne sobbed , clinging to [Cade]536-cade .

“ Of course , ”[151-the boy audrey] [he]151-the boy audrey soothed . “ [I]151-the boy audrey ’ll always come for [you]151-the boy audrey , [Daph]24-daphne . [You]151-the boy audrey know [I]151-the boy audrey will . ”[151-the boy audrey]

It was true . Though two years separated [them]152-the three of them in age , [the three of [them]152-the three of them]152-the three of them had roamed [[their]152-the three of them neighborhood]153-their neighborhood for years , fishing for crawdads , playing in [the pond]128-the pond , and [riding bikes]155-riding bikes . It never failed that [Daphne]24-daphne would get into some sort of scrape — like the time [she]24-daphne ’d pulled up a manhole and climbed down — and [Cade]536-cade would have to come after [her]24-daphne .

[Daphne]24-daphne caused trouble , and [Cade]536-cade rescued [her]24-daphne . And [Audrey]25-audrey stood by , because [she]24-daphne was [the good twin]25-audrey .

Until today , of course , when [Audrey]25-audrey ’s temper got the better of [her]24-daphne , and [she]24-daphne ’d suddenly become [the bad twin]25-audrey in a blink .

[Daphne]24-daphne wiped streaming hair off [her]24-daphne brow and scowled at [Audrey]25-audrey . “ [I]24-daphne ’m going to [the house]1308-the house and telling [Mom]30-mom . [You]30-mom ’ll be sorry , [Audrey]25-audrey . ”[24-daphne] [She]24-daphne turned and stomped off , heading back to [the neighborhood]140-the neighborhood .

[Audrey]25-audrey sucked in a breath . [She]24-daphne was totally going to be grounded .

“ Looks like the birthday celebration ’s going to end early , ”[536-cade] [Cade]536-cade told [her]24-daphne , heading down [the dock]147-the dock and reaching for [his]536-cade shirt . “ It ’s okay , ”[25-audrey] [Audrey]25-audrey said . “ [She]25-audrey ’ll forgive [me]25-audrey . [[We]1309-we ’re twins]1310-we ’re twins . [We]1309-we ca n’t stay mad at each other . ”[25-audrey]

[Cade]536-cade smiled , reaching out and ruffling [Audrey]25-audrey ’s hair . “ Well , since [you]1311-you ’re twins , [I]536-cade ca n’t give one a present and not the other , can [I]536-cade ? ”[536-cade]

And [he]536-cade leaned in and kissed [her]25-audrey on [her]25-audrey freckled cheek .

[Audrey]25-audrey flushed bright red , [her]25-audrey mouth gaping .

[Cade]536-cade pulled back , tousled [her]25-audrey hair again , and grinned . “ Happy birthday , [Audrey]25-audrey . ”[536-cade] When [she]25-audrey continued to stand there , [he]536-cade added , “ [You]24-daphne should probably go [home]1312-home and check on [Daph]24-daphne . ”[536-cade]

[Audrey]25-audrey nodded , then raced after [Daphne]24-daphne . [Her]24-daphne cheek throbbed in the perfect , perfect spot where [he]536-cade ’d kissed [her]24-daphne .

Sure enough , [Audrey]25-audrey was grounded that day . [Daphne]24-daphne had sobbed [her]24-daphne story to [[their]158-their parents]159-their parents , who were appropriately horrified . [Daphne]24-daphne was upset , and that was almost as bad as getting in trouble on its own .

As of that day , [Audrey]25-audrey learned two things .

One , that [she]24-daphne was never going to slip up and be [the bad twin]130-the good twin again .

And two , that [she]24-daphne was absolutely , without a doubt , in love with [Cade Archer]536-cade .

* * *

Twelve years later

[Audrey]25-audrey glanced in the bathroom mirror , smoothed a stray lock of hair into [her]25-audrey tight bun , and then straightened [her]25-audrey jacket for the eighth time that morning .

Time to approach [the boss]536-cade .

[She]25-audrey left [the bathroom]161-the bathroom , [her]25-audrey nerves tingling with a mixture of dread and wariness . Not that [her]25-audrey outward expression showed it . [She]25-audrey was very good about remaining calm and in control in a stressful situation , and this was definitely a situation . [Her]25-audrey low heels clicking on the marble floors of [[Hawkings Conglomerate]31-hawkings conglomerate ’s headquarters]162-hawkings conglomerate ’s headquarters , [she]25-audrey swept the mail out of the delivery basket and returned to [her]25-audrey desk . Once [she]25-audrey ’d sorted all the envelopes for [Logan]60-logan ’s personal attention , [she]25-audrey rubber - banded the rest and set them into [her]25-audrey mailbox to attend to later .

[Her]25-audrey hand paused over the tabloid on [her]25-audrey desk . After a moment ’s indecision , [she]25-audrey folded the magazine in half lengthwise and tucked it under [her]25-audrey arm . Then , with mail in hand , [she]25-audrey headed to [Logan Hawkings]60-logan ’s closed door and rapped twice .

“ Enter , ”[60-logan] [he]60-logan called .

[She]25-audrey did , [her]25-audrey stomach churning just a bit .

[He]60-logan did n’t look up as [she]25-audrey approached , continuing to type on [his]60-logan laptop . As was [their]163-their usual routine , [Audrey]25-audrey moved to [his]60-logan outbox and picked up any outgoing memos or faxes that [he]60-logan needed [her]25-audrey to handle . [She]25-audrey slipped [his]60-logan personal mail into [his]60-logan inbox , picked up [his]60-logan faxes , and glanced over at [him]60-logan . But [she]25-audrey could n’t make [her]25-audrey mouth form the request .

So [she]25-audrey stalled . “ Coffee , [Mr. Hawkings]33-mr. hawkings ? ”[25-audrey]

Chapter Two

Chapter Four

And [Hawkings men]1227-hawkings men were n’t soft . [They]1227-hawkings men had poor taste in [women]342-women , though . [[His]265-hunter father]1201-his father had married [[his]265-hunter mother]1229-his mother , and that had been a mistake for all parties . [Logan]60-logan stared at [his]60-logan cards , frowning , and tried to conjure up the face of [someone named [Gloria]119-gloria]1230-someone named gloria . Nothing . [His]60-logan memory was full of business meetings and contracts . [No women]1231-no women .

“ [I]60-logan ’ll take a look at it , ”[60-logan] [he]60-logan told [Hunter]265-hunter .

Two Months Later
